accomplishments.title: Accomplishments
list: Successfully developed and shipped to market a video game using C# programming language, Unity Game Engine and Steam as the distribution platform.

list.title: Assistant Deli Manager
responsibilities: Managed daily deli operations, including ordering, receiving, stocking, and merchandising.
Provided exceptional customer service and timely issue resolution.
Trained and supervised deli staff to adhere to safety and sanitation standards.
Helped increase sales and profitability through promotional planning.
Maintained accurate sales records and analyzed data for improvement opportunities.
Contributed to departmental budgets and financial planning.
Conducted performance evaluations and provided feedback to improve staff performance.
Ensured compliance with company policies and regulations for food safety and sanitation.

list.title: Assistant Retail Manager
list.location: Cellar And Pantry, Red Hill, VIC
responsibilities: Assisted in managing daily store operations, including inventory management and merchandising.
Provided excellent customer service, addressing customer inquiries and resolving issues.
Supervised and trained store staff on company policies, procedures, and best practices.
Contributed to the development and implementation of promotional strategies and marketing plans.
Maintained a clean and safe store environment in compliance with health and safety regulations.
Collaborated with store management to achieve sales targets and improve store performance.
Managed cash handling, reconciling daily sales, and preparing bank deposits.
Assisted in creating staff schedules, monitoring attendance, and evaluating employee performance.

list.title: Lead 3D Artist
responsibilities: Led a small team of artists in creating 3D assets for indie video games, adapting to various art styles and game genres.
Ensured project met technical requirements, quality standards, and was delivered on time and budget, while working closely with other team leads.
Collaborated with designers, animators, and programmers to create immersive game environments, characters, and assets.
Maintained consistency and quality of visual assets across the project, providing constructive feedback and creative direction.
Implemented optimization techniques for 3D assets to ensure smooth performance on various platforms.
Actively participated in project planning and brainstorming sessions to contribute ideas and insights.
Mentored and developed team members to advance their skills and careers, fostering a collaborative and supportive atmosphere.
